name: revere
description:
An abandoned chapel.
An old generator that won't start.
Someone or something else.
And not just one of them.



The hours here feel like weeks, but you have to endure it. You must find out the truth. About what? Even you don't really remember that well.
"revere" is a found footage survival horror game that takes the point and click mechanics of Five Nights at Freddy's and combines them with puzzles and minigames.



With each stage you have a different objective and a new added foe to fight.



The one thing that stays the same is that you still have to keep 'them' away. At all costs. The question is, do you have what it takes?
